website_summaries.verdict: The Viewsonic VX2703mh-LED may not have the best performance or the best feature set, but it's an affordable 27-inch monitor that does a good job of displaying fast motion, and it is easy on your utility bill.

customer_reviews.title: Broke in 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Was nice in the beginning and worked well for 6 months. Then screen began flashing randomly. Changed from HDMI cable to DVI. Seemed to work in the beginning but then the same problem. Warranty website says they need original packaging which I don't have anymore. My only hope is that it will work with a VGA cable now. This may be a defective piece but it should be easier to return.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, I bought it in 2013, still going strong!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this monitor back in 2013 because of what it offered for the price (and I think I got it on sale), anyway, seven years later and it's still going strong but I came to offer this review before I upgrade to a different monitor. Main Points: +Picture quality is great, which is the most important thing +Durable. This monitor has lasted longer than things that were connected to it. -Speakers are not good but I never use them anyway -Not VESA mountable Overall, the pros way out shadow the very negligible cons.
customer_reviews.author: anthony khan

customer_reviews.title: A very good choice for gamers, the best choice for general users on a budget.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and beautiful monitor, images are crisp and clear. The design makes the screen look bigger when it's off. Almost no glare except for the reflection on the rim. The leg is a little big so if your table is narrow there might not be enough space to comfortably fit a keyboard, otherwise this is a great buy. Also the price is pretty low compared to same sized monitor of other brands. The speakers i haven't really used, but is a very nice touch considering the insanely low price, which makes this monitor the best choice for users on a budget. Would definitely look into getting another if I ever need to use dual monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Duc Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Good while it lasted 4 years
customer_reviews.text: Seemed like a quality screen until it died today. Home office. Flashing lost sync for a few seconds and then shows a 'normal' but still flickering picture, back and forth. Different resolutions, different inputs, not the video card or cable. I will test the cheep power supply for 19v just in case that is failing. Dr. Google says no. Guess ViewSonic cut corners and is making junk. Monitors should last for years. Good monitors. Very disappointed. Will not recommend again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but inconvenient
customer_reviews.text: The image quality is good, and so are the connectivity options. But there are some ergonomic issues: The connectors are in the back and difficult to see or use without laying the unit down on its face. The controls are touch-sensitive spots on front of the base and almost impossible to see and use. When your hand reaches under the front, you can't see the spots you're supposed to touch, and if your finger grazes over the wrong area, you're hosed and have to start over. It's a clumsy and unfriendly design - probably enough to keep me from buying another one.
customer_reviews.author: Joey Riso

customer_reviews.title: This monitor is not flicker-free.
customer_reviews.text: I was not sure why this monitor looks less clear from other monitor. I've tested with electric fan and verified that this is not flicker-free monitor. Better to avoid for your eye health. If you are not sure, test with electric fan like following.
customer_reviews.author: CZI

customer_reviews.title: Was great monitor Failing within a year. ViewSonic support not responding to RMA request.
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with this monitor for about a year. The frameless bezel looks great. Picture is great. However, in the last few months the left side has turned to pinkish-purple, there are stripes, and sometimes it doesn't work at all. ViewSonic has failed to respond to multiple RMA requests at their horrid "support" website. It is under warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Mama2seven

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor!
customer_reviews.text: I'm really loving this monitor. I do have to say that the instructions on putting it together and hooking up SUCKED! Fortunately, I have experience in setting up computers and monitors, so I was basically able to do this on my own. I did have to make a phone call to my computer geek to answer one question that I was unsure about. The monitor itself is awesome! I would have gotten a larger screen, but couldn't due to space restraints. But, this one worked out just fine. It's large enough for these old eyes! Has a very clear picture and colors are great! I would buy again. Just wish the instructions were step-by-step to minimize confusion.
customer_reviews.author: C L Wier

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: After calibrating the display the colors are perfect and the perceivable change after warm-up is minimal. Fine-Tuning the display during calibration using the OSD menu was nearly effortless. Two things I've noticed with this monitor: -The touch-sensitive buttons are a little weird to get used to. There's no physical feedback when using the OSD. I'm never sure if I'm pressing in the right place. Luckily, I do not need to access the OSD very often. -The "sRGB" setting is NOT perfect. I wouldn't consider it an acceptable alternative to color calibration. IF you're a photographer, like myself, or in another visual field you MUST calibrate this display and not rely on the "sRGB" setting in the OSD.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah D. Corbin

customer_reviews.title: A Beautiful Picture!
customer_reviews.text: This monitor has an absolutely beautiful picture. I purchased it as an inexpensive monitor for my Mac Mini. A computer I only use for testing. I was surprised that the picture quality instantly. It matched the 2 monitors I have that are color balanced for photography. I now wish I had gotten a 27" version to match my other monitors. Oh and the internal speakers are pretty good too!
customer_reviews.author: Douglas James

customer_reviews.title: OK, but weird design. Might not work for you
customer_reviews.text: The screen is great as far as I can tell, but placing the connectors in the leg, exceedingly recessed, makes some cables not work at all with it (those having bulky electronics built into the HDMI connector like Video Port to HDMI adapters). In any case the cables are stressed most likely when connected to this monitor due to the bad design of the connectors area, which tries to make things very flat, but the cables must make low radius turns. I was not thrilled about the touch controls on front of the leg either. They are awkward to use. Brightnes and Contrast adjustments have minimal effect.
customer_reviews.author: C. Szabo

customer_reviews.title: Junk plastic over rated monitor
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this monitor after a week of research. Right out of the box it looked refurbished. The monitor would turn bright white as if the contrast was tuned up all the way. This behavior persisted and was intermittent. It had only been 3 months and it started happening more frequent. I called Viewsonic and they issued me an RMA but want me to foot the bill for shipping their defective product back. I will never buy a monitor from them again. The product was cheaply made plastic who’s picture quality was no better than 720 P resolution at best.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Customer Support??? I'll see if they're in!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I regret having to put the truth out there, but I purchased two of these monitors at the same time. Had a problem with one of them a week ago and contacted customer support. They have been less than attentive to my emails, Tweets and Facebook requests for a resolution. I contacted the President, Vice president and Marketing executives to no avail. I guess customer support means: "they hear ya, but can't help ya...." Great product initially with a reasonable price! Too bad they fell short on support! Oh Well, we live and learn to try new manufacturers.
customer_reviews.author: RTyler

customer_reviews.title: Edge to edge, frameless??
customer_reviews.text: For some reason I'm not getting the edge to edge. The top and both sides seems to have a 1/4" of black. I was expecting edge to edge picture. The glass goes edge to edge but what use it that if you can't fill the complete screen. Also not real sure of the HD quality. I have a GTX-950 video card and watching TV on this is somewhat blurry. The picture on my 22" ViewSonic was better. Last thing is the controls location, it's not very practical. Why would you put it underneath on the stand?
customer_reviews.author: Roger Westfall

customer_reviews.title: excellent monitor; great deal
customer_reviews.text: I hadn't purchased a ViewSonic monitor in about a decade; recently I've been purchasing from Dell. I was pleasantly surprised. The colors look good, although I haven't had a chance to do photo processing on it, yet. But for software development everything looks crisp and it's not too bright. The white looks just a tiny bit dull to my tastes, but nothing that gets in my way. Overall a great deal! One very important note: if you try to use a single-link DVI cable with it at full resolution, you'll get unstable, flashing pixels. Make sure you use a dual-link DVI cable (see pin diagrams on Wikipedia), which can handle the bandwidth required for this wide-screen monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Garret Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Lost resolution on left half of screen, speakers poor
customer_reviews.text: I have always been a big fan of Viewsonic however I am less so today. I am sad to report that after about 9 months the left 3rd of the display is showing a loss of resolution. The right hand side is perfect, but the left third shows pixels at about 1/2 the resolution. I sent an email to Viewsonic support and received no response. Also I should mention the speakers are terrible. Spend $10 and get an add-on pair. They will sound much better. I have had many of their monitors in the past and hope they raise their game a little going forward.
customer_reviews.author: M. Schwager

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor with No Glare
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these monitors and have had one of them for more than a year. I liked the first one so much that I ordered another one and now have a dual monitor setup. The screens have a matte appearance which is great since there really is no glare at all. The colors and sharpness are great. I understand that the buttons are kind of inconvenient, but not horribly so. Also, you cannot mount these monitors to an aftermarket stand which could be a problem for some. The IPS on this monitor makes viewing angles superb and great for photo editing where color consistency is critical. I would recommend this monitor to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: mookr

customer_reviews.title: If you a multiple monitor configuration - Awesome solution
customer_reviews.text: In my offices I use a three monitor configuration for both my Windows 8 and Mac Mini computers and instead of having a large strip of black between each monitor these ViewSonic monitors cut that strip down to almost nothing.... Creates a real slick three monitor configuration. Setup was very easy, HDMI, DVI and VGA inputs. Monitors are lower powered LED which saves power consumption not to mention no noticeable heat coming from the monitors. Only con would be that the monitors are not height adjustment, even though they do have a tilt adjustment. Not an issue with me... Started with three monitors and not have nine monitors for use in both of my offices. Hope this review helps.
customer_reviews.author: BorderBuyer_com

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Display, everything else is ok
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love the crisp, non-distorted image this monitor provides. I mainly purchased it for photo editing, until I have some photos printed, I won't know how well it performs in that regard, but I do love the display vs. my laptop and the HDTV I would use as a monitor. No separate screws to mount the monitor to the stand, simple to set up and install. However, the ports are extremely inconvenient and the power and adjustment buttons are hidden, poorly lit and difficult to access. I needed a flashlight to see the ports and the vertical position they are in makes cord insertion a lot more difficult than it should be. Poor instruction manual.
customer_reviews.author: pshim

customer_reviews.title: I have three now.  Great for photo editing and games
customer_reviews.text: I now have three of these set up on my desk at home all connected to the same computer. I use them primarily for work, games, and photo editing and I've been very happy with these for what they cost. You can find better monitors out there with higher resolution but you'll pay significantly more. Biggest complaint is the control panel but as others have said you mess with it when you get it then you won't ever touch it again. Whoever decided blank touch screen sensors vs physical buttons should really be smacked.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Hengst

customer_reviews.title: All in all they're all great monitors but the ViewSonic is much easier to calibrate ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a graphics designer and photographer. Currently this monitor is my @home monitor, while at work I use 2 LG IPS231's. After color calibration with a Spyder4Elite. The ViewSonic has sRGB of 99% and AdobeRGB of 78%, while the LG is 98%/78%. All in all they're all great monitors but the ViewSonic is much easier to calibrate and larger! - Unfortunately I have one dead pixel, but it is on my Windows taskbar, so I never notice it and it does not affect my workflow. Well worth the price, would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: N. Soliz

customer_reviews.title: A large matte screen like this is great for preventing eye strain
customer_reviews.text: A large matte screen like this is great for preventing eye strain. They are also very light which is nice. Even saving a few pounds is good when dealing with bulky electronics. As others have said the buttons are at an awkward position. I actually like the fact that they are on the base which means that using them doesn't push the monitor around. However they should have been placed in the front of the base.
customer_reviews.author: A. Nerd

customer_reviews.title: The colors are really vivid and I like the thin bezel
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these 3 years ago and they are both working flawlessly with no dead pixels at all. The colors are really vivid and I like the thin bezel. The worst part of these monitors is the stand and unfortunately there is no VESA mount to remedy that downfall. Oh well, since these were a great deal three years ago and after briefly perusing Amazon for monitors, it appears that monitors have not really come down in price since then.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor! Super sturdy and does not shake easily
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor! Super sturdy and does not shake easily, which is very important to me (I unintentionally kick my desk very so often). The frameless design makes it look 'premium'. The colors are great and there was no setup required. I am using it with my MBP using a HDMI-Thunderbolt adapter. My only observation is that the setup buttons are not located on the screen frame, but on the center panel just above the speaker. This makes them difficult to reach when you need to adjust brightness or other settings. This is not an issue for me as I don't see myself changing settings too often. Overall, a great monitor for the price. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Pratz

customer_reviews.title: A matte IPS display that can be calibrated for 2012 Mac Mini.
customer_reviews.text: I use this for PScs6, LR6, FCPX, Motion, Compressor, Pro Tools 11, and Logic X. Great color, deeply recessed buttons and connectors. (Have a flashlight handy for the setup) If I'd just purchased this a few months ago, I would have saved a lot of trips and returns to the big blue box store. If you can swing it, get the one that can show the entire Adobe gamut. I had another ViewSonic LED, but I needed a larger 1080 display. Works great in a studio with either DVI or HDMI.
customer_reviews.author: murphy761

customer_reviews.title: Excellent if you get a new one.  If you get a used one, sold as new, then you might have trouble.
customer_reviews.text: This is second one that I had ordered. This one is excellent. Although the speakers are weak in the bass range, kind of tinny sounding. I have an older Viewsonic monitor with much better sound, so I have something to compare it to. If you don't care about sound, or have external speakers, then this one is a great buy; look no further! I would have given it at least 4 stars if the first one that I ordered didn't come used, with pixel damage, missing cables and covered in fingerprints. Amazon straighten that out, though.
customer_reviews.author: Da Ewok

customer_reviews.title: Really nice monitor with a good price!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice monitor for a good price. My last monitor that I had for 10 years finally pooped out so I went on the hunt for a replacement. After comparing features and reading reviews the Viewsonic came out on top. And even better the price was right in line with the competition. Setup was a breeze and I had it up in running in no time. Picture is beautiful, sound is ok. Honestly, the sound isn't that great but I already have a smoking surround sound system for my PC so this was not an issue. If you want to use the monitor's sound system it's alright, about the same as a flat screen TV.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sersig

customer_reviews.title: A photographers review
customer_reviews.text: I've had this monitor for 10 months now and it has been perfect. I am a professional photographer and moving to this monitor has helped a lot. Budget friendly, accurate and purty! The speaker is pretty weak and the button placement is a little weird but once you have it set up, you'll forget about it and probably wont even touch it. The description says frame-less but it's really not because of the black border, not a deal breaker though. The white balance is perfect, brightness set to max and contrast down to 70.
customer_reviews.author: Desmond

customer_reviews.title: Nice monitor. This is the first monitor I have ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice monitor. This is the first monitor I have bought since I moved to the US. In the past I used to own a TN monitor which costs the same as this one. The screen looks moisture and I thought that maybe $100 22-inch monitors were the same. This monitor, however, makes me realize that I was wrong, and gives me a brand new experience. This monitor displays as good as $200 monitors, such as the DELL U2412M I used in the past. Besides, the sound effect is great and it is convenient to use with a macbook via HDMI cable.
customer_reviews.author: Si Chen

customer_reviews.title: Only drawback is no VESA mount
customer_reviews.text: It's not altogether obvious but I bought this monitor, then went to upgrade to two thinking I could mount them both to a dual monitor. I purchased the second one and the mount before I realized these don't have the VESA mounting points. I guess I figured they all did and never looked closely. Other than that, the monitor is great for function but you can't height adjust or mount it. Which to me both are major drawbacks, and having neither is even worse.
customer_reviews.author: Oweezy9

customer_reviews.title: Crispy and noce at first but.......
customer_reviews.text: When new it was excellent, nice image, but few weeks later (yes, weeks, some 8 to 10) part of it discolored. I will send it to ViewSonic to see if they can repair as it is still in the guarantee. May be a coincidence, but I got concerned about the quality
customer_reviews.author: arfritz

customer_reviews.title: Hi quality Monitor
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome, i purchased 2 of these after a 3 week research, impossible to be happier, none have dead pixels, contrast is great, price was awesome $530 for two. default calibration is OK, but you will have to lower brightness, controls are a little misplaced, not an issue for me because i only calibrate once. should have come with built in PS, little fonts will not display clear, that is expected for a 27" monitor, Microsoft windows 8 calibration does a good job if you don't have calibration software. Update: 6-14-2013 i just received my 3rd one, works great in AMD eyefinity, i use it mostly for flight simulation, I CANT BE HAPPIER.
customer_reviews.author: Rammolo

customer_reviews.title: Easy solution for shadow/blur text - Do not use VGA Cable (use HDMI or purchase DVI cable seperately)
customer_reviews.text: Use of VGA cable on this HD screen will create a shadow effect on text (this occured on two monitors - same model). You will need to either use the HDMI cable the monitor comes with or purchase a DVI cable seperately, which will also provide the digital HD signal required to solve the shadow/blur effect. I'd have given the monitor 5 stars if it came with a DVI cable (I couldn't use the HDMI cable included with the monitor on my laptop docking station) - not sure why they include a VGA cable with the monitor since VGA only allows for an analog signal and makes the monitor's image appear much inferior to the monitor's design capacity.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and long trusted manufacturer.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my disabled brother. After seeing him squinting at his 22 - inch monitor I decided it was time for a new one. I've always had View Sonic monitors after the urging of an IT professional where I worked. The colors are brilliant and my brother, well, he spends more time on his computer with less headaches.
customer_reviews.author: Cindi W

customer_reviews.title: ViewSonic has always been known for quality
customer_reviews.text: I watched a YouTube video from someone that bought this monitor and he liked it. So I decided to buy two of them. The first one worked right out of the box. The second one was ordered later. The second one worked on HDMI and VGA, but not DVI, (confirmed by View Sonic Tech support) so I sent it back for replacement. The replacement had a damaged screen even though the box was not damaged. The replacement for that one is here and working fine. Very bright and controls easy to use. Windows 7 and up allows you to scale the text up and is very clear. The LED backlight won't dim like older monitors with florescent backlight.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: I really love this monitor
customer_reviews.text: I really love this monitor. I was given one of these as a gift sometime ago and really wanted to set up a dual display for my desktop Pros: Crisp images Vibrant color Bright screen Sleek design with the slim bezel Cons: Monitor does not swivel or adjust in height which causes some complications positioning two on a desk together It also does not have any mounting capabilities
customer_reviews.author: Dawnsicle

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic bezel-less monitor
customer_reviews.text: As noted in other reviews, this monitor arrived in its own brightly colored box-not external packaging. The box does come with a carry handle on top so it was delivered upright the way its supposed to. The touch buttons are indeed "up-under" the bottom of the screen on the base. This does not bother me, but some may get irritated by this. In addition, the fact that the power button is touch sensitive and close together with the other buttons requires your index finger aim to be precise. The button does light up once pressed. Other than that, there were no dead pixels and the screen display is absolutely stunning. Very happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: justonelook

customer_reviews.title: Good Monitor
customer_reviews.text: I like this monitor. Good quality, nice color. Decent price on Amazon too. Some people complained about the placement of buttons that control the settings of the monitor, but I don't mind it that much. Sometimes it's a little hard to push a button, but once you have your settings chosen, you shouldn't have to push them much unless you are going back and forth between inputs (HDMI, DVI, VGA). I like the thin frame edges, makes the screen feel very big. Ordered this when my old monitor took a tumble and cracked. Amazon prime got this shipped out fast and let me continue my work without much delay.
customer_reviews.author: DKP

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: My 27" monitor came with finger screws to secure the base to the stand. Maybe they updated the stand based on other reviews. The monitor is nice size looks nice. Note- we use this in an office and with the same resolution as the old 23" we get exactly the same amount of information on the screen, our computer can't go any higher than 1440x1900 resolution but the text is larger. So if you have a 23 or 24" with the computer resolution maxed out and expect to fit another spreadsheet on the screen by upgrading to a 27" it's not happening. It's easier on the eyes though with a larger font.
customer_reviews.author: E. Allegretti

customer_reviews.title: Wish it would have worked well, looks nice
customer_reviews.text: The monitor worked well for about 1 week and then would start showing "Sparkles" and wavy lines. The cables were good and tested out OK so they were not the issue. You could get it to reset for a few hours by changing the resolution and then changing it back to the native resolution. Something is incorrectly designed with the control board inside, several reviews mentioned that they have issues over time. The monitor was on a UPS so it was not power issues.
customer_reviews.author: SamW

customer_reviews.title: Nice picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp crisp picture and easy to set up. I am using the HDMI connection as it is the best. Stand is solid as it just sits on my computer table. Only one design I don't like is the placement of the control buttons as they are on the stand (which I like) but very hard to access. I have to place my hand under the center of the monitor and reach behind & up to make adjustments. Very difficult to do easily. But because I like the picture quality so much I gave it 5 stars. Probably should give this monitor 4.5 if I could.
customer_reviews.author: George Kulczewski

customer_reviews.title: Looks pretty, dumb controls, useless speakers.
customer_reviews.text: The screen is awesome, the speakers are horrendous, why'd they even bother? Also, the controls are in about the dumbest, most inconvenient place you could ever put them, especially for touch controls where you need to see what you're doing because you can't go my the feel of buttons. Again, very nice image quality, I'm thrilled with this monitor, but I will be getting something with a comparable panel and a more thought out design when it comes time to upgrade to two monitors. It'll probably still be a ViewSonic, I'm really that thrilled with the picture quality.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Beckley

customer_reviews.title: My eyes are sighing with relief.
customer_reviews.text: My vision is less than ideal and I do digital photography. This huge screen lets me preview my edited photographs is real-size or larger so I can be sure my prints will be good. I will say though, I almost took off a full star because of the absolutely, well, I try not to be rude, but the placement of the controls is absolutely moronic. It is a phenomenal pain in the foot to duck, reach under the monitor to the stand and use the crowded, sensitive touch buttons for adjustments. But the picture is great. Thanks to those who wrote reviews stating that they only get full resolution with DVI, that saved me a lot of headache.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: good low cost mometor
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Good clear picture with no bad pixals. Low cost. Best price for this type of monitor I have found. CONS. No adjustment for virtical height, I am baffeled on how to use the adjustment control for brightness and contrast. The buttons are too small and difficult to use. Thank GOD the picture was so good I did not have to use those stupid controls. Also the buttons are located on the stand and that alone causes problems trying to mannipulate the controls. Over all its a good monitor at a great price and so far I can live with its falses.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good for viewing! Love it! No more pain in my eyes after switching from TV used as a monitor
customer_reviews.text: This is a great monitor. Previously, I was using my TV as monitor and found it very pain-full to the eyes. After switching to this proper monitor, my eyes do not get such pain anymore. Monitor looks great for viewing work, videos etc. Only issue what I can tell about this monitor is the cable sockets which are too cramp and makes it difficult to fix. Because you have to bend the connecting cable to fit within the rectangle block provided. Other than this, everything else is great!
customer_reviews.author: GettingWise

customer_reviews.title: excellent monitor
customer_reviews.text: No complaints about this monitor. The color is crisp and vibrant. The IPS is great as was the price. Unbelievable price; a couple of years ago you would have to place another zero behind the price to purchase a comparable monitor. When I print my photos, I have confidence that the color on the screen is a near perfect match to the print. This is my second Viewsonic monitor. I still own my first monitor, purchased back in 2006, which works well, just wasn't IPS and there was a slight problem with color accuracy that monitor calibration could not resolve. This monitor addresses those issues and also allows me to play games with no lag. :-)
customer_reviews.author: TanyaTop Contributor: Sewing

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful screen
customer_reviews.text: I was so relieved to find out my PC hadn't died, but just the monitor was kaput. So I took the opportunity to still keep the price reasonable, but enlarge the monitor. Now I can use the largest icon size and fonts and have great visibility. It was literally plug and play! (Once I found the incredibly discrete power button at the base, that is.) Yeah, I'm over 50, took me a while with no help from the quick startup papers. Clear and easy viewing!!
customer_reviews.author: Christalina

customer_reviews.title: The User Loves it
customer_reviews.text: THe ViewSonic VX2370SMH-LED was purchased for a client and the client could not be happier. The video quality is exceptional and the fact that the monitor has a built in sound system enhanced the appreciation. I would seriously recommend this product for anyone looking for a monitor that will help remove some of the clutter from their desks. The only drawback is the location of the control buttons., They are located under the front panel. BUT that was not a problem because my client wanted the monitor elevated for comfort and a better view. This is really a very good monitor for the price. Hope that helps.
customer_reviews.author: J. Myles

customer_reviews.title: Sharper and easier on the eyes than my 21" monitor
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the monitor for two weeks and appreciate the sharp images and type compared to my old 21". Everything is sharper because of the 1920x1080 resolution. It installed itself on Win 10 and Mac Snow Leopard and Win 7 so I did not use the CD included in the box. I do not use the built in speakers. The on off switch is in the center of the base. I haven't touched any of the other controls.
customer_reviews.author: Irvin Paik

customer_reviews.title: WOW, Stunning to say the least!!
customer_reviews.text: Please keep in mind this monitor was received late yesterday and installed shortly thereafter. So we have only had the opportunity to use it for about an hr or so. Stunning, beautiful, very small footprint, really amazing design. Picture quality is really, really crisp. I know we have a Geforce video card and we are using the HDMI connection from pc to the VX2270 monitor. Viewsonic has always made great products, this one is no different. Since the speakers are integrated, we haven't tested the sound quality so much. However first impressions and testing so far in our home, stunningly beautiful picture quality.
customer_reviews.author: dromesburg

customer_reviews.title: It has been on 14-16 hours a day 7 days a week for over two years and is still working perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Pros This monitor has been on 14-16 hours a day 7 days a week for over two years and is still working perfectly. No problem with drivers in both Ubuntu and that other OS. Flawlessly handles what ever the vid card feeds it. Cons Controls are way back under the monitor at the top of the stand. Hard to reach and hard to see. (once it was set up I really haven't needed the controls)
customer_reviews.author: Norseman

customer_reviews.title: All around excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up. Excellent mechanism for attaching base to monitor, doesn't require extra tools and simple to take apart again if needed. Great picture. Serviceable built in audio. Very nice external design. Great vertical tilt range. Some oddness with audio output source allocation when running with Windows 7, nothing that couldn't be figured out with a little Control Panel experimenting. Works like a dream, as expected, with OS X.
customer_reviews.author: Kei

customer_reviews.title: Awesome picture quality!!
customer_reviews.text: The picture quality is outstanding and the monitor itself looks really sleek. Its super thin and light. The controls are easy to use and has nice inputs that are easy to use...i.e they don't bind the cables andmake you feel like you are going to break something trying to plug a cable in. The only con is the speakers. They are terrible and you can barely hear them even with the volume all the way up, but I won't knock a star because I don't buy monitors to use the speakers.
customer_reviews.author: starlord

customer_reviews.title: Good product, terrible service
customer_reviews.text: We have 7 of these monitors in the office and they have worked great and I've recommended them to others. I have to give 2 stars for ViewSonics terrible service though. We ordered our 7th monitor for the office and it came with a faulty power cable. We tried to work with them to replace it and they want us to pay to ship the entire monitor and everything back to them (would cost more than just buying a new cable). We have tested this with our 6 other monitors and know that it is just a bad cable. Very disappointed in their service and will be looking at other monitor manufacturers next time we order more monitors.
customer_reviews.author: Logan Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor - excellent color and crisp graphics! Easy to set up and connect to any PC. I will say that as a computer monitor, the image does NOT go all the way to edge as it seems to indicate in the description - I think it is if you use it as a TV monitor but not sure - I was a bit disappointed in that but for the price I got, this is a great purchase! Still happy with all my previous ViewSonic monitors - will never use any other!
customer_reviews.author: Sam Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Impressive if not spectacular for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This monitor has been extensively tested and reviewed by Tom's Hardware (see tomshardware.com/reviews/aoc-i2757fh-viewsonic-vx2770smh-ah-ips,3385.html). Saturation, greyscale, and contrast are excellent. I bought it and use it for video editing. The sound is poor (I recommend external speakers) and the controls are practically hidden under the screen. They are very inconvenient. The rear inputs are not much better. But despite these minor deficiencies, this monitor performs like a screen 2-3 times its price.
customer_reviews.author: Bill D.

customer_reviews.title: ...a bad experience can have positive results...
customer_reviews.text: ...I originally had to make a choice...this VX or a VG...I chose the VG...upon receipt of the monitor...it had a defect...returned it...you had no stock to replace the defective VG...I waited...and waited...and waited...still no replacement...cancelled the order for the VG...purchased the VX ( as you had them in stock )...received the monitor...found this VX monitor to be far superior to the VG I originally purchased...it was fate...I'm so glad the pieces fell together the way it did...
customer_reviews.author: Randy Hurdle

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Looks fantabulous. The button placement doesn't bother me, as I have it situated at eye level, so the buttons are easy enough to get to. I've had it for about 3 weeks now and the quality still blows me away sometimes. No glare, no picture fading, and it was in perfect condition with no dead pixels when delivered. Excellent and inexpensive. Update: It's now February 2015, and I still love my monitor. I bought a second for myself, one for my daughter, and am getting them for my husband and son as well. I LOVE this monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Truce

customer_reviews.title: Broken two times in a year...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this monitor two years ago, after using 3 month, it starts to flash sometimes. Then I kept it for a few months, it died. I shipped it back and I had to pay the shipping which is around 50 bucks. After a month, they shipped me another one. Not sure it is the same one or different one. I used for a few month and the problem happens again. I kept it to use till now. Yesterday, it died totally. And I guess I had to spend another 50 bucks on shipping it back.... I can almost buy a new one... This is just super terrible... Not recommend...
customer_reviews.author: Lesong

customer_reviews.title: Color & Resolution issue
customer_reviews.text: it is decent for the purchased price. I don't like that it could not be raised nor lowered. it just tilts forward or backward about 10 degrees. The color saturation is fare but not great. The resolution is poor. I would avoid this monitor if you are buying for photo editing or even watching movies once awhile. it is perfect for data processing and surfing the web but nothing beyond office use. The speaker is a convenient addition, but don't expect anything more flat sound. HDMI is a great feature which caught my attention.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great design, easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: I am an iOS developer and I recently upgraded my Mac Pro and compromise my Apple Cinema Display 27" with ViewSonic to support my upgrade. I am glad I did. I love my new Mac Pro with my new ViewSonic monitor. I plugged in my HDMI cable which comes with it free and default color settings was natural which works and looks like Apple Cinema Display. I am not doing any graphics design or any other related work so this works perfectly for my setup. I open my Xcode and I am in heaven. I recommend this monitor definitely. Love it so far...
customer_reviews.author: coolbukz

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this monitor for over six months and still as bright as the first day I opened the box. I am very happy I made the decision to buy this one. Previously I had a Dell and paid twice as much and it only last me a little under two years and it would not turn on. When I spoke to Dell, they said the warranty was only a year and they could fix it but it would cost me about 200 dollars. Who in the right mind would do that when you can get this one for about the same brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Eder Arellano

customer_reviews.title: Good price, great picture - what more do you really need in a monitor?
customer_reviews.text: Used it for a week so far. Amazing quality. Big upgrade over my old Samsung 24 inch LCD. Good price. Some of the reviews complain about a lack of features, but I really don't like the feature creep in monitors these days. I want my monitors to show a pretty picture and be able to handle photo and video editing. This is an extremely reasonable IPS monitor for a non-professional photographer and videographer. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn B. Wikle

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and just what I wanted at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about it. The picture is gorgeous, the resolution great, the viewing angel is amazing and it seems to stay cooler than any other monitor I ever had. Even the touch buttons work well. My only complaint would be that the built in speaker doesn't have an option to leave it on when more speakers or headphones are plugged into the monitor port. I was hoping to use that as a front speaker and leave the other two sitting on a desk beside and behind me. That said, I was initially planning on not getting a speaker at all. That this one came with one was just an extra anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle E Suzenski

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful picture
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful image clarity and color reproduction. Very easy on the eyes. Multiple input connection types for dual computer output. Not the greatest speakers but they do fine. The Touch controls are tucked away and I need to really hunt for the right input instead of a nice tactile button. There is no height adjustment, just tilt.
customer_reviews.author: B. Higgins

customer_reviews.title: The sensors would be good if they were mounted on the screen
customer_reviews.text: I despise the touch sensors mounted on the monitor pedestal. The sensors cannot be seen. The sensors control the power on/off and screen functions. The sensors would be good if they were mounted on the screen. Making the monitor "frameless" has come at a cost. I would not have purchased this monitor if I could have seen it in a store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Matted screen is real clear and no ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Matted screen is real clear and no glare from my window which is behind my desk.. Even word docs and excel spreadsheet sheets are clear. Just plugged it in and was good to go wit no adjustments required
customer_reviews.author: David Pritchett

customer_reviews.title: Great for photography
customer_reviews.text: I've had this monitor for a couple of months now and couldn't be happier. I do a lot of photographic work and am very pleased with the color and resolution. I can actually get an accurate idea of how my images will appear in print. I have this connected to a laptop and I found that the resolution was not right until I disabled the screen display on the laptop. Once I did that, setup was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: GogTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, Fast delivery, would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent monitor. Would buy again. Using it on my computer to do graphic design. Using high-end graphic design packages to creat my own images and background. Good monitor to be working with. I have had no problems and have been using it for quite awhile
customer_reviews.author: RawSenior

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Monitor.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful display with no angle worries. Super easy to adjust with the sRGB setting for my artwork and easy to work in tandem with your graphics card for the extra tweaks you want. I also love the fact that it is an energy efficient monitor. As soon as my computer is asleep or off in any way, the monitor immediately powers down. Then, it is quick to power back up as soon as I restore my computer. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Good with caveats
customer_reviews.text: Picture is very clear and color look great. I had to return the first monitor because of a very noticeable stuck white pixel. Easy return and had the new monitor before I had even returned the first. I'm not a fan of the touch capacitive (sp?) buttons with no feel feedback. I wish the back had a better way to route the cables so they aren't as visible from behind. Very good monitor for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Bc

customer_reviews.title: Excellent monitor.
customer_reviews.text: Clear and bright. Visible from all angles and the frameless design is cool. I primarily use it for gaming, movies, and web browsing. Had to dial the brightness way down from the factory setting. I've spent nearly eight hours straight staring at it without getting watery eyed. You'd probably have to spend twice as much to get a noticeably better monitor. As others have mentioned, it has an external power supply and the control buttons are a little different from what you would expect. I'm personally OK with these items. If you are too, then this is a very solid pick.
customer_reviews.author: Craig the Z Man

customer_reviews.title: 3rd Gift Returning!
customer_reviews.text: All hooked up properly, downloaded software and the screen keeps bleeping off! Christmas gift!! This is the 3rd item this week we have had to return or settle for damaged shipping! WHAT is going on, Amazon? I have counted on you for years to provide quality gifting?
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Noftsinger

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I got this on a gold box deal for a great price. I was surprised that it had built in speakers. I just read the monitor information so the speakers were a bonus. They dont sound super awesome but there is an equalizer built in that can help with some normal sounding music. The image quality is really fantastic. I use it side by side with a fairly expensive Dell and this one blows the Dell out of the water with quality of image, clear and sharp pictures and the added bonus of the speakers. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: MissGreen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the price, and amazing in general
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor. It arrived safely and had no blemishes on the monitor itself. The speakers are adequate, and they work good for watching videos, playing the occasional headphone-less game, etc. The IPS display is also great for all angles. The brightness is rather low though, so I had to crank up the contrast a bit. As others have been saying, the controls on the stand are a pain to get to. ViewSonic includes a VGA to DVI adapter. Overall this is a fantastic deal that goes easy on the wallet, and performs great while doing so.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Really great!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this monitor! The quality is wonderful. I needed a new monitor because I just got a new gaming pc, and I wanted something that could do full HD to make the gaming experience better. This does exactly what I want it to do. I love the size and for the price, its not too bad. It also has pretty good viewing angles which is a plus. I am overall happy with it, and I would recommend it to gamers and people who just need a good HD monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Beauregard

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Plus: The picture quality on this monitor is EXCELLENT. Caveat: It's not exactly "frameless". While the physical frame around the glass in negligible, the picture doesn't take up 100 % of the glass, so you still have a 1/2" black border. Minus: The control buttons couldn't be less-easily accessible unless they were on the back. The speakers work fine, but the sound quality isn't awesome. I would definitely buy this again for the price.
customer_reviews.author: John Morris

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I took allot of time making sure that this was the product that I wanted - thanks to YouTube and comments on Amazon I was able to make the decision and I couldn't be happier - This monitor displays a great picture - the only thing that you'll need is some good speakers and your all set!!! And as always great service from Amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: Russell

customer_reviews.title: but it was fine, I saw nothing wrong
customer_reviews.text: Documentation included shows how to attach the base but not how to turn on the monitor. To turn the monitor on or off, push the area on the vertical part of the base under the monitor, in the center, halfway up. When on, a blue light appears at the switch. I bought one sent from Amazon that was cheaper because supposed damaged packaging, but it was fine, I saw nothing wrong, once I figured out how to turn it on (I panicked before, when I saw a black screen).
customer_reviews.author: Verax

customer_reviews.title: Even my wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife who was always complaining about her old monitor being blurry and hard to read. I installed it without telling her and the next time she booted up her PC she instantly noticed. "What did you do to my computer? It looks wonderful!" As for myself, I immediately saw the picture is bright and extremely detailed. I even had to turn down the brightness to 75. Now I'm jealous....
customer_reviews.author: Ed E. Morawski

customer_reviews.title: Perfect (from a designer/programmer)
customer_reviews.text: I have been a programmer and web designer for over 15 years, and I've gone through a lot of different monitors. This is bright, with a lot of color depth and contrast. The only downside is that the stand is short, so you will need some books or a stand to elevate it to head height, but that happens with nearly all monitors.. This was my first ViewSonic, and I am very impressed. My next monitor will be another ViewSonic. AND!!! It's American Made. Buy it. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Color Rich Monitor
customer_reviews.text: First, the Monitor has the most brilliant colors I have ever seen on any monitor. Secondly, it is a very nice, modern looking monitor. No adjustments needed right out of the box. I do not do any graphics or photo editing, and mostly use for spreadsheets, e-mail and browsing. So far, I am very pleased. I am glad I got the 27" and not the 28". This is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Nice Picture, but Little Else
customer_reviews.text: Two dead pixels when it arrived, but I'd already returned another monitor so I kept it out of frustration. The angle of the plugs in the back are awkward, to say the least. The buttons on the front work fine, but they are hard to find and use. I have to bend over and find the area that forms the 'button' almost every time I turn it on. Definitely could have used a USB pass through or two. Outside of that its got a lovely picture and bright colors.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: the monitor is fine. I can see several vertical color difference bands ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall, the monitor is fine. I can see several vertical color difference bands when displaying solid background color, though not very obvious. Not sure if it is normal, or it will get worse quickly. Let's wait and see. The design of back where the power line goes in is silly. Not easy to find the right spot, and doesn't accommodate the power line very well.
customer_reviews.author: YIZHOU Y

customer_reviews.title: ViewSonic VX2770SMH-LED 27-inch SuperClear IPS LED Monitor (Frameless)
customer_reviews.text: This is my first ViewSonic monitor and I like everything about it. I use the f.lux application to dim automatically with the sun if anyone is interested in how it operates with this monitor, it does. I like the stand, I like the touch on/off, I like the frameless look, I like the matte no glare screen, I use HDMI cable (not supplied). The price was very reasonable for this monitor, I would buy another from Amazon. I use with AMD Radeon HD 7660HD graphics in a Gateway mini desktop.
customer_reviews.author: Blinky Morgan

customer_reviews.title: maybe a power surge or something like that, but then the others blew out in ...
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased THREE of these monitors... so why the 3/5 rating? Because I purchased two at the same time to go "dual-screen" and after about 2 years one of the colors blew out (only green and blue could be seen... no red). I thought that this was just a fluke... maybe a power surge or something like that, but then the others blew out in the EXACT same way and in the same time period. So if you think the money is worth 1.5-2.5 years of screen time, then go ahead and purchase. Otherwise I loved them. :-|
customer_reviews.author: John Obrecht

customer_reviews.title: Crips, versatile, good color rendition
customer_reviews.text: With a narrow bevel, mostly what you see is a well-lighted, crisp, true color image. Because this has an 18V external power supply, I got a 12V to 18V adapter and plug this directly into the cigarette lighter on my travel trailer. I use two of these with my laptop. A very inexpensive super wide computer screen.
customer_reviews.author: Robko

customer_reviews.title: A solid monitor
customer_reviews.text: So far I like this thing. Light weight. Good picture. You can plug the output of sound into its inputs. I dock it a star because it has several stuck pixels. I know the manufacturer is up-front with me about it (read the description, somewhere it says it might have 2-5 stuck pixels or something). So I can't give it only 2-3 stars like I want because I was warned.
customer_reviews.author: time. less.

customer_reviews.title: Dead at the second year!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this monitor on June 2013, and it is still within the 3-year warranty period. But the left side of the screen started to become red recently. This is not easy to see if I use Microsoft's blue desktop background, but it is very obvious if I open a MS Word file with white background. It seems that the quality of this monitor is at least not as good as reviewed! It is also no longer eligible for return through Amazon. Anyone can tell me who I should contact for return and replacement? Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: xz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to have a larger screen for work. I use a work laptop and docking station and had trouble having a large enough screen to see what I needed to see. I was particularly interested in how an Excel spreadsheet would look. On my old 19" HP monitor I could only see the first 6 columns on the spreadsheet even on the highest resolution. On this one I can very easily see 12 columns. I am very pleased and would highly recommend this monitor for home office.
customer_reviews.author: Rafa

customer_reviews.title: Clear, colorful, General Use Desktop Computer Monitor w/ Speakers
customer_reviews.text: I have used this monitor for a month and have enjoyed the clarity, vibrant colors, and size. Use it with my desktop computer for everyday internet browsing and media. Video and pictures look great. Internal speakers sound good for the size and location. I have the monitor face height while sitting at my desk and have not had the problems that other reviews have reported with the menu buttons. Came with all the required cables and cords to be up and running in seconds. Met all my expectations with a great price as a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: TKMiagi

customer_reviews.title: perfect and rich colors
customer_reviews.text: This is my first monitor or TV that wasn't the old-style tube type. I am very impressed with this ViewSonic 23" monitor. Wide viewing angle, perfect and rich colors, solid blacks, excellent and sharp text, non-glare plastic screen, exactly as described. NO dead pixels. Plug-and-play, with included install disk - all I did was set the screen resolution. My OS is XP, I have a lower-end video card. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Excellent monitor and setting up was breeze
customer_reviews.text: I just got my VX2270. Excellent monitor and setting up was breeze. Note power button is under the monitor by the stand. I'm still exploring this monitor's capabilities but for now I happy with it. One thing to note to people who are debating to go larger size, go for larger size. This 21.5" viewable screen is still big enough for me but I could have gone up to 23.5".
customer_reviews.author: H. Ma

customer_reviews.title: Excellent monitor
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for something to watch HD shows on, play games in HD, and connect my Xbox to. All these functions are more than adequately fulfilled. The screen is just the right brightness (although on xbox with the HDMI it was a little off) and it does look great from any angle just as the IPS feature indicates. Its also lightweight, and thin. It has a very simple design, with no distracting lights or other annoyances. Simple, and incredibly effective. The price was also spot on, all things considered. Highly reccomended.
customer_reviews.author: Sean K.

customer_reviews.title: I have used Viewsonic monitors for at least 10 years
customer_reviews.text: I have used Viewsonic monitors for at least 10 years in my computer business. I like Samsung and Viewsonic as my first choices. I will only buy the VX series...I think VA series while cheaper do not have specification or reliability of VX series. These VX monitors are very clear, well made and seem to last at least 3 - 5 years in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Rob B.

customer_reviews.title: It's been a while since I bought a monitor but..
customer_reviews.text: I love this monitor. Before turning it on I knew I was hosed. I'd have to but a 2nd. I bought this to compliment my HP 2010i on my Linux machine but I knew that when I put it on the desk that HP wasn't long for this world. The monitor physically is fantastic. It looks great as you unbox it. I wish it was able to be mounted on an arm and the stand is a little cramped to screw in the cables but who cares; you do that once. The image is fantastic. I had to download new wallpaper. I'm really happy with this monitor.
customer_reviews.author: M. wells

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for college aged son, he loves the slim lines and the clarity of the monitor. He uses it to skype , play video games, watch streaming videos on Hulu or netflix and is very happy with its performance so far. have had it for 6 months and no issues whatsoever. he also like that is is light than many because he has to move a lot in college so being portable is a big benefit.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L. Sauter

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd ViewSonic I've had. The 1st monitor is still running fine down the street at my mother-in-laws house. I had it for approx. 3 yrs & the picture quality is still as good as the day I bought it. I just needed a larger monitor. Arrived undamaged w/in a couple of days using "Prime" which I haven't regretted buying as I make quite a few purchases through Amazon. Would purchase again. Great value for the $$$
customer_reviews.author: Fifty1Fifty

customer_reviews.title: An excellent monitor with a couple of design flaws
customer_reviews.text: Pros: --attractive design --bright, diverse colors --viewing angle --comes with an HDMI cable Cons: --non-adjustable stand --buttons location --disappointing built-in mono speaker Also, this can be just me, but there seems to be about 1/4 of an inch around the screen edge that doesn't get filled when using HDMI and there's no way to stretch the picture through the monitor controls. Otherwise, I'm very happy with the monitor. I'm a regular gamer, playing games on this one is a pleasure.
customer_reviews.author: Capree9

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful color!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a monitor for my new Mac mini, did the research on several different monitors before deciding on this one for the best combination of visual quality and value I could afford. I have been very happy with this product, the real surprise was how good the sound is for my late night video watching, which was not on my radar when purchasing! My only concern was that it shipped with no other box but the retail viewsonic box, which I thought was rather odd given how items are often double packed and unmarked.
customer_reviews.author: Design Muse

product_meta.title: ViewSonic VX2770SMH-LED 27" IPS 1080p Frameless LED Monitor HDMI, DVI, VGA
product_meta.description:
Size:27-InchThe ViewSonic VX2770Smh-LED features an LED backlit 27-Inch frameless design widescreen monitor with up to 40% energy savings compared to a regular 27-Inch monitor. Mercury free VX2770Smh-LED offers Full HD 1920x1080 resolution, HDMI and DVI with HDCP and VGA inputs, external power supply, SRS Premium Sound, and 30,000,000:1 MEGA Dynamic Contrast Ratio. The stylish glossy ID and thin profile combine to make it the center piece to your home or office. The SuperClear IPS panel with wide viewing angles and ultra high contrast ratio delivers extraordinary visual clarity, making the VX2770Smh-LED an excellent choice for entertainment and gaming. A 3 year warranty, the industry’s best pixel performance policy, energy saving Eco-mode and Windows 7 certification help ensure the product quality for years to come. The brightness is 250 cd/m2

AMAZON.COM


ViewSonic’s VX2770Smh-LED features an LED backlit 27" frameless widescreen monitor with up to 40% energy savings compared to a regular 27" monitor. Environmentally friendly mercury-free VX2770Smh-LED offers Full HD 1920x1080 resolution, HDMI and DVI with HDCP and VGA inputs, SRS Premium Sound, external power supply, and 30,000,000:1 MEGA Dynamic Contrast Ratio. The stylish glossy ID and thin profile combine to make it the center piece to your home or office. While the SuperClear IPS panel with wide viewing angles and high contrast ratio delivers extraordinary visual entertainment. A 3 year warranty, the industry’s best pixel performance policy, energy saving Eco mode and Windows 7 certification make VX2770Smh-LED an excellent choice for entertainment and gaming.

KEY FEATURES:
 * Uses 40% less power, without compromising your viewing quality and has mercury-free WLED backlight.
 * SuperClear IPS (in-plane switching) panel technology for 178 / 178 degree wide viewing angles, and the most consistent color performance.
 * Sleek frameless design and thin profile with touch sensitive controls.
 * Full HD 1080p with 16:9 aspect ratio, achieves perfect image reproduction without distortion.
 * Connectivity options for Digital HDMI and DVI (with HDCP) and Analog VGA inputs 
 * 30,000,000:1 MEGA Dynamic Contrast Ratio for true-to-life picture depth and clarity in any room.
 * Dual stereo speakers with SRS Premium Sound for a rich multimedia experience.
 * Includes LCD Monitor, VGA cable, HDMI cable, audio cable, power cord and adapter, Quick Start Guide, ViewSonic Wizard CD-ROM.

 

WHAT IS SUPERCLEAR IPS TECHNOLOGY?
ViewSonic VX70 series SuperClear IPS monitors deliver an extraordinary level of visual clarity. IPS (in-plane switching) technology eliminates image distortion and color shifting to ensure true, lifelike color from virtually any viewing angle.

 * Brilliant, Lifelike Color: ViewSonic SuperClear IPS monitors deliver amazing, lifelike images in which true colors are beautifully replicated on the screen. The colors you see in real life are accurately depicted on all ViewSonic SuperClear IPS monitors, ensuring high-color accuracy and consistency from screen to print.
 * Super Wide Viewing Angles: ViewSonic SuperClear IPS monitors produce true colors and consistent images when viewed from the front, from the sides, from below, and from virtually any other viewing angle. No matter your perspective, you will not have any color shift or changes in contrast ratio when you move the image across the screen or change your viewing angle.

 



FRAMELESS DESIGN WITH EDGE-TO-EDGE GLASS AND ULTRA-SLIM BEZEL
Say goodbye to the thick, clunky plastic frames set over the edges of traditional monitors. ViewSonic VX70 series SuperClear IPS monitors feature a frameless edge-to-edge glass faceplate with an ultra-slim bezel beneath the glass. With their sleek, eye-catching design, our elegant IPS monitors look as good as they perform.

 



WHAT IS A LED MONITOR?
The term "LED monitor" generally refers to a monitor with a LCD panel and a LED backlight. A typical LCD monitor uses cold cathode fluorescent lamps (CCFL) as a light source to illuminate the LCD panel. In an LED backlit monitor, white LEDs (Light Emitting Diodes) are used as the light source. Environmentally friendly LED backlights provide the following benefits: 

 * About 40%* less power consumption compared to traditional CCFL monitor
 * 30,000,000:1 MEGA Dynamic Contrast Ratio 
 * Environmentally friendly mercury-free backlight
 * Low EMI (Electro Magnetic Interference) 
 * Slimmer design
 * Weight reduction

 



SAVE CASH AND SAVE THE PLANET
With its mercury-free backlight and low energy consumption, the ENERGY STAR certified VX2770Smh-LED saves your electricity bill. The savings of LED can add up to thousands of dollars saved for large install bases, such as big corporate buildings or schools. The savings can be as dramatic as $20,000 in five years!

 



SRGB COLOR CORRECTION TECHNOLOGY DELIVERS THE MOST ACCURATE COLOR PERFORMANCE AVAILABLE
ViewSonic LED monitors embedded sRGB color correction technology reproduce 100% sRGB rich color for color performance matching original input sources without decreasing or leveraging color quality. sRGB ensures all displayed images/videos are as natural as the original sources, displaying real color for captured camera and camcorder content.

 



MEGA DYNAMIC CONTRAST RATIO
One of the great features of VX2770Smh-LED is its ability to dim the backlight completely for pure darkness during dark scenes, such as a night shot in a movie. Contrast ratios refer to the ratio of the brightest color to the darkest color. With traditional CCFL backlit displays, contrast ratios are limited to the fluorescent lamp’s ability to dim, in order to reproduce darkness. However, with the LED backlight, each LED has the ability to completely shut-off allowing for a near infinite ratio of black to white contrast. The end result is true blacks that result in greater overall image quality.

 



FULL HD 1080P RESOLUTION
The VX2770Smh-LED features a 27" widescreen with 1920x1080 resolution is capable of displaying a native Full HD 1080p image. Today, devices that can display Full HD content output are getting more and more common. However, without a native Full HD display, you will not be able to experience the picture clarity and the details of the 1080p content you view.

 



ECO-MODE FOR UP TO 30%* ENERGY SAVINGS
ViewSonic’s proprietary Eco-mode function comes standard with the VX2770Smh-LED. When you don’t need all the power the VX2770Smh-LED has to offer, you have the option to reduce the monitor’s brightness, save energy, save the planet and prolong the lamp life. You can select one of the "Optimize" or "Conserve" options and save up to 30% energy. Especially under low ambient light conditions, adjusting the brightness will improve visibility by reducing eye fatigue. Reducing brightness will also prolong the monitor’s lamp life, improving your return on investment.

INDUSTRY-LEADING PIXEL PERFORMANCE GUARANTEE AND 3-YEAR LIMITED WARRANTY
One of the aspects that make ViewSonic a market leader in displays is its dedication to quality. ViewSonic is committed to using the highest grade panels, and offers an industry-leading pixel performance policy. We also back our displays with a 3-year limited warranty for your peace of mind.
